    • Method Detail

      • isFlying

        boolean isFlying()
        Returns:
        Whether the player is currently flying

      • canFly

        boolean canFly()
        Returns:
        Whether the player can fly

      • setCanFly

        void setCanFly(boolean value)
        Gives/Takes away the ability to fly. Doesn't impact those in creative mode.

      • forceFlyState

        void forceFlyState(boolean value)

      • getFlightSpeed

        float getFlightSpeed()

      • setFlightSpeed

        void setFlightSpeed(float value)
        Sets the player's horizontal fly speed. Default is 1. See setVerticalFlightSpeed(float) for vertical flight speed.

        InventoryPlayer getMCInventory()

      • getInventoryContainer

        noppes.npcs.api.IContainer getInventoryContainer()
        Returns:
        A 40 slot container where (0 - 8) left to right are hotbar slots. (9 - 35) left - right, top - bottom, (36, 39) is armor

      • getInventorySlot

        noppes.npcs.api.item.IItemStack getInventorySlot(int slot)
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot to get the item from (0 - 8) left to right are hotbar slots. (9 - 35) left - right, top - bottom, (36, 39) is armor

      • setInventory

        void setInventory(noppes.npcs.api.IContainer contents)

      • setInventory

        void setInventory(noppes.npcs.api.item.IItemStack[] items)

      • setInventorySlot

        void setInventorySlot(int slot,
                      noppes.npcs.api.item.IItemStack item)
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot to get the item from (0 - 8) left to right are hotbar slots. (9 - 35) left - right, top - bottom, (36, 39) is armor

      • openEnderChest

        void openEnderChest()
        Opens the player's ender chest for themselves.

      • openEnderChest

        void openEnderChest(IPlayer enderChestOwner)
        Opens a player's ender chest for a specified player
        Parameters:
        enderChestOwner - The IPlayer whose ender chest is viewed

      • openCraftingTable

        void openCraftingTable()
        Opens a crafting table. Any stored items are returned to the player when closed.

      • openFurnace

        void openFurnace(boolean persistent)
        Opens a furnace for the player
        Parameters:
        persistent - When true the furnace will retain its items. Persistent and non-persistent furnaces are separate.

      • getPlayerData

        noppes.npcs.api.INbt getPlayerData()
        Returns the specified player's playerdata in NBT form. If you are looking for playerdata related to customNpcs+ then use #getData()

      • getSelectedHotbarSlot

        int getSelectedHotbarSlot()

        boolean isOperator()
